title: @targons blade can you help with this. support ticket peeps confusing me.
body:
I made a support ticket about me losing LP for the game saying I was dced when I wasnt and I got a response saying since I wasnt in lane or had no CS that it was a warranted loss of LP, when in this 3 minute match the support himself didnt have CS either.

here is a gif of me moving through the jungle after asking riven to head top and she proceeded to say no and die midlane to syndra.
https://gyazo.com/d7b9e9be388156bd63cf66417872ccab
here is an image of the minimap showing me in the top lane.
https://gyazo.com/9c36662c8a50430961ff0b49c19e3e36
if you go and look at the match the alistar bot lane didnt move all the way upto 2:47 when the surrender vote was already cast and suceeded with two votes for and 3 votes against more proof behind that I was actually their, and here is proof of that with the surrender vote.
https://gyazo.com/6eea93741a80ec013130cae4e13ac82d

(ps if you go to watch the replay.gg it literally takes likes 30 mins to go through the watch live que which i've had to do twice now, fair warning.)

replies.body:
Since you're working with a game specialist in a ticket about this, I recommend asking the specialist for clarification on this since this is their specialty. 

Let me know if you have any other concerns outside of this.
